newsitem.title: USA: Blyth says Konrad to assume CFO duties.
newsitem.headline: Blyth says Konrad to assume CFO duties.

text.p: Blyth Holdings Inc, a supplier of tools and components for client/server and Internet applications, on Tuesday said board member Bill Konrad will assume the duties of chief financial officer.
Bill Glynn will continue as vice president of finance reporting to Konrad, Blyth said in a statement.
The CFO's duties had been handled by Steve Lorentzen until his announced resignation as president and chief operating officer on February 5, a company spokesman said.
Blyth also said David Colby, formerly a director and chief financial officer for American Medical Response Inc, has joined Blyth's board of directors.
